span.p: Burleson ISD is committed to providing a website that is accessible to the widest possible audience, regardless of technology or ability. This website endeavors to comply with best practices and standards defined by Section 508 of the U.S. Rehabilitation Act. If you would like additional assistance or have accessibility concerns, please contact us at webmaster@bisdmail.net or 817-245-1000. We are always striving to improve the accessibility standards of our website.
